column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////While I haven't tasted anything I did not like
column2: the stand out so far is definitely (yep you guessed it) the chocolate croissant!  chocolatey
column3: perfectly flaky ooey gooey goodness right there!  The same endorphins you get from the Big O's...yeah that's how good that croissant is.  I'd eat 2 and won't bat an eyelash.
